name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 110
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Omicron has awakened. Another day another new COVID variant to be worried about. However, although I can’t help but thinking of the destroyer of planets Unicorn anytime I hear this variants name and the CDC has labeled Omicron a variant of concern most cases appear to be mild. Fingers crossed that we all get through the holiday season healthy and safe. Stay safe and get your vaccination! Colors inspired by the OG Unicron!
